title: mri_nlfilter
description: This program processes an image using a nonlocal filter and writes the results to an output file. It supports different filtering methods such as median, Gaussian, and mean.

input_image.title: Input Image File
input_image.description: The input image file to be processed.

output_image.title: Output Image File
output_image.description: The output image file where the processed image will be saved.

blur_sigma.title: Blur Sigma
blur_sigma.description: Specify sigma of the blurring kernel. Default is 0.500.

gaussian_sigma.title: Gaussian Sigma
gaussian_sigma.description: Filter with Gaussian instead of median. Requires sigma value.

mean_flag.title: Mean Filter Flag
mean_flag.description: Filter with mean instead of median.

window_size.title: Window Size
window_size.description: Specify window size used for offset calculation. Default is 3.

no_offsets_flag.title: No Offsets Flag
no_offsets_flag.description: Don't use offsets, just apply standard filters.

no_crop_flag.title: No Crop Flag
no_crop_flag.description: Don't crop to >0 region of image.
